item.title: AP Research
item.description: AP Research Syllabus (PDF) Teacher: Mr. Li Office Hours: TBD Course Description Course Objectives You’ll learn this And also that Perhaps some of this too. Recommended Readings Vasquez, John A (2009). \emph{The War Puzzle Revisited}. New York, NY: Cambridge University Press. Wagner, R. Harrison (2007). \emph{War and the State: The Theory of International Politics}. Ann Arbor, MI: The University of Michigan Press.
